responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "DB87A203487369D8539F77A6FE8C361A", "I need raw plant and animal matter in bulk to extract a purified, concentrated deconcotion of both types of essence. My research demands both, but the Scholar\'s Academy has provided me with extremely limited resources. I thought it best to leave the decision on how to handle this to the experts in acquisition.")
name: DDR_0014_Lorne_23
